tr.td: This is the official port of Sun's &java; Development Kit for FreeBSD. No known significant bugs exist at this time, but there are no guarantees of usability. However, many commercial companies rely on this port, so it should be safe to use.

td.p: JDK 1.6 support is available. Currently supported versions are FreeBSD 6.2 and later (for i386 and amd64 architectures).
JDK 1.7 support is available. Currently supported versions are FreeBSD 7.0 and later (for i386 and amd64 architectures).
